name: Tampax Cup
description: Carefully measured rim, a U-shape, a short rounded stem -- all details that let you wear it all day without feeling it.

name: Tampax Pearl
description: We tested with women. We tested with machines. We meet FDA expectations. We're the real deal.

description: Our silicone is soft enough for comfort, and our shape makes it strong enough to stay in place. We got you.

name: Always Daily Liners
description: Get a fresh start all day, every day with Always Thin Daily Regular Liners. Always Thin Pantiliners are incredibly thin and comfortable, designed to feel like fresh underwear so you can wear them every day.

name: Durable Underwear
description: Our silicone is soft enough for comfort, and our shape makes it strong enough to stay in place. We got you.
